name: Life is Cheap
description:
Life is Cheap was made for the Ludum Dare 44 Game Jam, the topic of which was 'Your life is currency'.

This is the first game jam that I've entered and I am  a rather novice programmer.

There are lots of improvements to be made, especially to the UI and UX,  and balancing, and I'm sure some bugs will crop up. As a game though, there is lots of space to grow the concept and add more content.

Thank you for playing!
